flow.description:
here are demo and examples to illustrate: 
- Expression language 
- JOLT operation 
- PG setting (batch and even orientation)
- Kafka connection
- Scripts using 
- Flow optimisation
flow.name: demo

From NiFi through KafKe to NiFi

properties.all:
SELECT *, '${now():format("MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss")}' AS process_time
FROM FLOWFILE

properties.generate-ff-custom-text: {"device": "Laptop", "brand": "Dell", "specifications": [ "Intel Core i7", "16GB RAM", "512GB SSD", "NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650", "Gold housing", "Extra DeskTop" ] }

properties.correct:
SELECT * FROM FLOWFILE
WHERE column_3 IS NOT NULL
  AND column_3 NOT LIKE '%[a-zA-Z]%'
  AND column_3 NOT LIKE ''
  AND column_3 NOT LIKE '%,%'
  AND column_3 NOT LIKE '% %'
  AND column_3 NOT LIKE '%[!@#$%^&*()+]%'
properties.incorrect:
SELECT * FROM FLOWFILE
WHERE column_3 IS NULL 
   OR column_3 LIKE '%[a-zA-Z]%'
   OR column_3 LIKE '%,%'
   OR column_3 LIKE '% %'
   OR column_3 LIKE '%[!@#$%^&*()+]%'
   OR column_3 LIKE ''
properties.for_error:
SELECT * FROM FLOWFILE
WHERE 
  CASE 
    WHEN CAST(column_2 AS DOUBLE) IS NULL AND column_2 IS NOT NULL THEN 1
    ELSE 0
  END = 1
